metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Black Day In December has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity.
